title: Engadine Maccas Signs Were Pooping Up Everywhere At Sydney’s Bloody Huge Climate Strike
text:
Thanks for signing up!

In support of the Global Climate Strike - a week of action to demand climate justice, from September 20 to 27 - Pedestrian Group is doubling down on content that educates and empowers you to do your bit for our planet. Click here to learn more about the global movement fighting for our future.

An absolute legion of folks who actually give a damn about our planet (fancy that) have come together across the country to protest the lack of action in the climate change realm with some thought-provokingly hilarious signs.

The epic signs have included everything from pop culture references to catchy slogans and a bunch of them directly called out our good-for-nothing PM by bringing to light the steamy rumour that he took a dump at Maccas back in ’97.

Among the shitload of protestors were a bunch of youngsters who weren’t even on this earth when ScoMo ~allegedly~ took the infamous dump who proudly held signs and did Greta Thunberg proud.

Have a go at ’em, folks:

we can’t change what happened at engadine. but we can change the climate #ClimateStrike pic.twitter.com/wCJXhezF5F — matt d (@mdxnz) September 20, 2019

Okay not playing favourites but hell yeah to the Engadine Maccas sign. #ClimateStrike pic.twitter.com/acmaPLbJSf — Alex Bruce-Smith (@alexbrucesmith) September 20, 2019

READ MORE More Than 50,000 Pissed Off Sydneysiders Crammed Into The Domain For The Climate Strike
description: Australians attended the Climate Strikes to protest, using signs that took aim at the Prime Minister Scott Morrison pooing himself at Engadine McDonald's.
